TopicTitle: Are there any good Kopernicus planet mods compatible with Kerbol Plus?

Articles.Content: I have KerbolPlus which adds around twice as much if not more bodies to the KSP system, but that's not quite enough to feed my growing hunger to have more planets in KSP. So does anyone know of any Kopernicus planet mods that are capable with KerbolPlus? (i.e no conflicting planets, etc)

Trans-Keptunian will definitely be fine. I'm pretty sure Asclepius is OK. I *think* Outer Planets Mod is OK.

New Horizons rearranges the system and includes support for all three of Outer Planets Mod, Trans-Keptunian, and KerbolPlus; if the New Horizons developers don't make mistakes then all the planets will stay clear of each other.

Of course adding loads of planets will hog memory. It might not be practical on 32-bit versions of KSP.
